verbs.description: [ARG0: islamists] [V: rally] [ARGM-LOC: in pakistan] [ARGM-PRP: for death sentence for christian hundreds of supporters from an extremist islamist party have rallied] in the eastern pakistan city of [ARGM-PRP: lahore to pressure judges to uphold a death sentence for a christian woman convicted of blasphemy asia bibi has been on death row since 2010 after she was convicted of insulting islam prophet muhammad chanting] hang infidel asia activists from the tehreek - e - labbaik party also rallied in other cities friday [ARGM-PRP: threatening nationwide protests if authorities free the woman pakistan lahore high court supreme court of pakistan islamists islamabad supreme] court islamist party asia bibi lahore

islamists rally in pakistan for death sentence for christian hundreds of supporters from an extremist islamist party [V: have] rallied in the eastern pakistan city of lahore to pressure judges to uphold a death sentence for a christian woman convicted of blasphemy asia bibi has been on death row since 2010 after she was convicted of insulting islam prophet muhammad chanting hang infidel asia activists from the tehreek - e - labbaik party also rallied in other cities friday threatening nationwide protests if authorities free the woman pakistan lahore high court supreme court of pakistan islamists islamabad supreme court islamist party asia bibi lahore
